job.title: Manager, Data Scientist
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongWhy BiogenbrbrstrongOur mission to find therapies for neurological and rare diseases is a unique focus within our industry and this shared purpose is what connects us as a team We work together to overcome obstacles and to follow the science We are resilient as we strive to make an impact on our patients lives and on changing the course of medicine Together we pioneer Together we thrivebrbrstronguAbout This RolebrbrustrongThe Manager  Marketing Sciences role will be tasked with weaving structured and unstructured data together from across Biogen and working with business stakeholders to develop testable hypotheses You will be working directly with teams across our Commercial organization including but not limited to Marketing Market Research Patient Services Field Force excellence  Multichannel Excellence PRC and many others to answer complex business questionsbrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrbrustrongThis role will be responsible for deriving actionable insights for marketing and leadership teams by leveraging all available data assets In this role you will need to have the ability to influence decisionmakers to adopt a quantitative approach when measuring impact success and other outcomes Ability to translate technical findings into actionable insights for business stakeholders is a key aspect of this role Projects can range from patient finding initiatives across therapeutic areas  Marketing Mix models  all the way to AI driven models to support next best action This position is a high visibility role that will touch many aspects of the companybrbrstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliPharmaceuticalBiotech experience requiredliliEndtoend experience with data including querying aggregation analysis and visualizationliliDeep understanding of the tools of the trade including a variety of modern programming languages and visualizing insights via standard toolscharting methods excel PPT Ability to effectively present and defend analyseslili Experience in effective data visualization approaches and a keen eye for detail in the visual communication of findingslili Strong project  Deliverable management and Task oriented ability to deliver moderately complex analytical and crossfunctional projects with limited guidanceliliStrong Communications  both efficient and succinct in verbal and written communicationsdeliverables excellent data visualization skills able to distill complex analyses into meaningful insights and conclusions excellent ability and persistence in influencing stakeholders to adopt datadriven recommendationsliliDealing Well with Ambiguity  Intensity  operates well in a fastpaced environment driven by senior leadership requests and evolving needsliliStrong analytical skills for effective problem solvingliliDevelopment of regression classification and clustering models based on customer level dataliliExperience and understanding of Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniquesliliAdvanced knowledge with one Data Science Language and familiarity with at least a second Python R Scala JavaliliWorking knowledge of Relational DatabaseliliExperience working in a commercial organizationbrliulstronguDesired Skills brustrongulliExperience with cloud storage platforms such as AWS Databricks Snowake etcliliGood knowledge of R CC Java JavaScript etcliliExperience in NLPNLUNLGSpeech RecognitionDialogue SystemliliExperience in ad hoc reporting and analysisliliKnowledge of Bayesian statistics and their implementationliliExperience with Visualization tools like Tableau or QlikbrliulstronguEducationbrbrustrongBachelors Degree RequiredMasters Degree in related field preferred Or a minimum of 4 years experience in AnalysisData Science fieldsbrbrAdditional InformationbrbrThis role will be responsible for deriving actionable insights for marketing and leadership teams by leveraging all available data assets
